name: Tetrominos Puzzle Block+
description:
Dropping Blocks X-TETRO with great feeling, fantastic graphics and is totally customizable. There are 3 play modes Classic, Mission, Challenge. With this gold version we also introduces the X-TETRO, they are special cubes and the way simple controls that will help you greatly to get out of tight spots.
Good old tetromino became one figured and therefore more dynamic and interesting.
This game is for all the tetromino admirers and especially for those who consider themselves as to tetromino professionals. Check to find out if it is still so! Anyone who will try this game will completely love it!

X-TETRO with the way simple play is Touch, Drag and Drop. Let’s go to your high ranking in the world, now !!!.

Here are some key features of "X-TETRO":
• 3 Amazing modes: Classic, Mission, Challenge.
• 15 speed levels.
• Simple game controls, one figure for all control with play type Touch, Drag and Drop.
• Beautiful game design and music.
• Saved high scores table.
• Your ranking all of the world on game center.
• Saved game options.
• Plus more!
